name: Titanium.UI.ListSection
summary: A list section is a container within a list view used to organize list items.

methods.name: appendItems
methods.summary: Appends the data entries to the end of the list section.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item(s) can be inserted with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

methods.name: deleteItemsAt
methods.summary: Removes count entries from the list section at the specified index.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item(s) can be removed with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.summary: Returns the item entry from the list view at the specified index.

parameters.name: itemIndex
parameters.summary: Index of where to retrieve an item.

methods.name: insertItemsAt
methods.summary: Inserts data entries to the list section at the specified index.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item(s) can be inserted with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

parameters.name: itemIndex
parameters.summary: Index of where to insert the items.

methods.name: replaceItemsAt
methods.summary: Removes count entries from the list section at the specified index, then inserts data entries to the list section at the same index.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item(s) can be replaced with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: Index of where to remove then insert items.

methods.name: setItems
methods.summary: Sets the data entries in the list section.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item(s) can be inserted with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

methods.name: updateItemAt
methods.summary: Updates an item at the specified index.
methods.description: On iOS, the list item can be updated with an animation by specifying the animation parameter.

parameters.name: index
parameters.summary: Index of where to update the item.

properties.name: filteredItemCount
properties.summary: Returns the item count of the section, also incorporating the search filter if active.

properties.name: footerTitle
properties.description: Using this property and footerView together is not supported. Use one or the other.

properties.name: footerView
properties.summary: View to use for this section footer.
properties.description: Using this property and footerTitle together is not supported. Use one or the other. In Alloy you can specify this property with a <FooterView> child element of a <ListSection> element (see Examples).

properties.name: headerTitle
properties.description: Using this property and headerView together is not supported. Use one or the other.

properties.name: headerView
properties.summary: View to use for this section header.
properties.description: Using this property and headerTitle together is not supported. Use one or the other. In Alloy you can specify this property with a <HeaderView> child element of a <ListSection> element (see Examples).

properties.name: itemCount
properties.summary: Returns the item count of the section.
